exclusion: Put the Z-Wave interface controller into "Remove" mode, triple press the Program button (A). It will be excluded to network
inclusion: Put the Z-wave interface controller into “Add” mode, triple press the Program button (A). It will be included to network.
label: MP22Z
overview:
Outdoor AC Plug

Key Features:

  • Remote ON/OFF control via the Z-Wave controller
  • Manual ON/OFF control with the front panel push button
  • Support Association Group and Auto Report switch status
  • Over temperature protection
  • Support firmware upgrades via Over-the-air (need Gateways support)
usage:
Manual reset: click the button 2 times quickly, and hold for at least 10 seconds.
Host reset: Remove it from the host and the device is factory reset.
Note: This should only be used in the event your network’s primary controller is missing or otherwise inoperable.

category.label: Power Outlet
category.description: Small devices to be plugged into a power socket in a wall which stick there

parameters.label: LED Indicator
parameters.overview:
Value: 00(default) outlet on,led on.

Value: 01 outlet on,led off.

Value: 02 led off, led no work.

parameters.label: Auto Turn-Off Timer
parameters.description: The countdown time, the socket closed
parameters.overview:
Countdown time can be set.

LED flashes two times when the configuration parameter is changed

parameters.label: Restores state after power failure
parameters.overview: Parameter=6，Size=1，Value=0 output off Value=1 output on Value=2 (default) out put the state after power

options.label: out put the state after power

associations.label: Lifeline
associations.overview: This Device supports Lifeline (association group 1) supporting 1 node for lifeline communication. Group 1 must be assigned the Node ID of the primary controller where unsolicited notifications will be sent. The Z-Wave controller should set this association automatically after inclusion. Lifeline association only supports the “Device Reset Locally” function. Refer to the instructions of your controller for any available details on how this can be set.

associations.label: Left outlet send basic set
associations.description: Support 2 groups, each group max support 2 devices
